collectible.title: Lyralei's Weapon
collectible.subtitle: A finely crafted bow and quiver
collectible.text: The only warning your enemies will receive with these will be the slight breeze that puffs their cheek as the arrow that kills them finds its mark. If you're as skilled as Lyralei, at least.
collectible.unlock: Win in a game against Lyralei to get her famous bow and quiver.

collectible.title: Lyralei's Bottle
collectible.subtitle: A magical bottle with water inside
collectible.text: An old bottle that survived the ages - the contents placed inside become enchanted. It seems to be mostly filled with water, but possibly some other liquids mixed in as well.
collectible.unlock: Beat Lyralei in a heads up - a situation with only you and her as the last remaining players - to get her trusty bottle.

collectible.title: Lyralei's Arcana
collectible.subtitle: The Compass of the Rising Gale
collectible.text: A magical artifact blessed with the powers of the guardian wind. It not only grants their powers, but makes the wearer become one with the wind, changing on their appearance as well.
collectible.unlock: Every third game Lyralei will offer a bet to show her precious Arcana. Win the game and with that her bet for this mysterious flower.

collectible.title: Lyralei's Postcard
collectible.subtitle: A cute postcard sent from a tropical island
collectible.text:
There is a note on back of the photo:

"Hey there! Remember me?

We played that little game of strip poker (which went a bit too far...) on that great beach some time ago.
Well, I loved that place so much that I had to visit it again with some friends. Being here made me think of you… maybe we can visit it together some time?

Alright, Traxex wants me to stop writing that 'stupid postcard', so I gotta go. Hopefully I can convince some of them to join the next game of strip poker... wouldn't that be great?!
They're all preeeeeetty hot!

Kisses, Lyralei"


(Original art by DJComps, Edit by n949)
collectible.unlock: Lyralei always wanted to visit a beach...

collectible.title: Lyralei's Naughty Picture
collectible.subtitle: A risqué picture dropped by Lyralei
collectible.text:
A naughty picture of Lyralei's friend Traxex, the Drow Ranger. It appears to be taken in front Lyralei's forest, but it's still a mystery how this picture came to be.


(Original art by GreenMarine, Edit by n949)
collectible.unlock: Play enough and Lyralei might just drop a naughty picture...
